content: if you wish to support me you can buy me a coffee 1 1 https //ko-fi com/the_garnet_leaf ------------------------------------------------- a pretty and practical basket with 6 pockets to organize all the little things ------------------------------------------------- i was looking for something to keep all my chargers cables and other electronic stuffs which tend to pile up around my computer i couldn t find any pattern i really liked so i had to create my own the inside of the basket in green is worked first with a decorative base in single and double_crochet the outer basket in black is worked starting with the base in single_crochet then building the side and forming the pockets at the same time and finally turning at the brim to end with a quick decorative lattice thanks to the multiple layers the basket holds it shape pretty well the instructions are fully written out and one part is also charted gauge is not crucial but it is best to use a combination of yarn and hook which gives a dense fabric you could quite easily adjust the size of the basket or the number of pockets as this pattern is free it has not been tested if you find any mistakes typos or find the instructions unclear you can reach out to me in the comment section
